item.name: Auth Managment
item.description: APIs to manage the login and logout

formdata.description: Must be a valid date. Must be a date before or equal to 2008-05-31.
this must be a syrian city.
name must be unique company name . Must be at least 3 characters. Must not be greater than 20 characters.
Must not be greater than 4000 characters.
Must be at least 5 characters. Must not be greater than 20 characters.
this must be a syrian city.
Must be at least 3 characters. Must not be greater than 20 characters.
Must be at least 3 characters. Must not be greater than 30 characters.

request.description: Note: the user will be deleted
return 404 if the image is null

body.raw: {"industry_name":"vitae","job_role_id":"sint","location_type":"on-site","attendence_type":"full-time","max_salary":24,"min_salary":17,"max_age":16,"min_age":25,"description":"Laboriosam accusantium dolorem architecto suscipit similique exercitationem ut.","transportation":true,"health_insurance":true,"military_service":true,"gender":"male","skills":["vel"]}
